Package Interfaces

Interface iActorBehaviour

All Superinterfaces:
iReturnOrder
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionalClient, Actor, OrdinaryClient, SpecialClient, TaxInspector
public interface iActorBehaviour extends iReturnOrder
The iActorBehaviour interface represents the behavior of an actor in the market.
